23 public static void Inserir(TagModel t)
24 {
25 string cmdInsert = "INSERT INTO Tag(nom) " +
26 "VALUES(@nom)";
27 try
28 {
29 Connexio.Connectar();
30 MySqlCommand comanda = new MySqlCommand(cmdInsert, Connexio.Connection);
31 comanda.Parameters.Add("@nom", MySqlDbType.VarChar, 20);
32
33 comanda.Parameters["@nom"].Value = t.Nom;
34
35
36 int files_afectades = comanda.ExecuteNonQuery();
37 }
38 catch
39 {
40 MessageBox.Show("ERROR AL INSERIR A LA BASE DE DADES 'TAG' ");
41 }
42 finally
43 {
44 Connexio.Desconnectar();
45 }
46 }
52 public static int GetTag_Id(string nom)
53 {
54 Connexio.Connectar();
55 string cmdSelect = "SELECT tag_id " +
56 "FROM Tag " +
57 $"WHERE nom = @nom";
58 MySqlCommand comanda = new MySqlCommand(cmdSelect, Connexio.Connection);
59 comanda.Parameters.Add("@nom", MySqlDbType.String);
60 comanda.Parameters["@nom"].Value = nom;
61
62
63 int? resultat = (int?)comanda.ExecuteScalar();
64 int r1 = 0;
65 if (resultat != null)
66 r1 = Convert.ToInt32(resultat);
67 Connexio.Desconnectar();
68 return r1;
69 }
75 public static TagModel GetTag(int id)
76 {
77 string cmdSelect = "SELECT nom " +
78 "FROM Tag " +
79 $"WHERE tag_id = @tag_id";
80 TagModel tag = new TagModel();
81 try
82 {
83 Connexio.Connectar();
84 MySqlCommand comanda = new MySqlCommand(cmdSelect, Connexio.Connection);
85 comanda.Parameters.Add("@tag_id", MySqlDbType.Int32);
86 comanda.Parameters["@tag_id"].Value = id;
87
88 string tag_name = (string)comanda.ExecuteScalar();
89
90 tag.Tag_id = id;
91 tag.Nom = tag_name;
92 }
93 catch
94 {
95 MessageBox.Show("ERROR: No s'ha aconseguit cap");
96 }
97 finally
98 {
99 Connexio.Desconnectar();
100 }
101 return tag;
102 }
107 public static List<int> ObtenirTotsId()
108 {
109 Connexio c = new Connexio();
110 string cmdSelect = "SELECT tag_id " +
111 "FROM Tag";
112 List<int> llistaId = new List<int>();
113 try
114 {
115 Connexio.Connectar();
116 MySqlCommand comanda = new MySqlCommand(cmdSelect, Connexio.Connection);
117
118 MySqlDataReader reader = comanda.ExecuteReader();
119 if (reader.HasRows)
120 {
121 while(reader.Read())
122 {
123 int id = reader.GetInt32(0);
124 llistaId.Add(id);
125 }
126 }
127 reader.Close();
128 }
129 catch
130 {
131 MessageBox.Show("ERROR: No hi ha cap tag");
132 }
133 finally
134 {
135 Connexio.Desconnectar();
136 }
137 return llistaId;
138 }
139 }
140}
